sentences.english: Such an army would influence all the old armies and rally them around itself.
sentences.chinese: 這種新軍將影響並團結一切舊軍。

sentences.english: He trains a new army with a large number of military talents.
sentences.chinese: 編練新軍，訓練出大批軍用骨幹。
